hanzi-su-wiki:
粋

Значения

Элегантный, шикарный; цвет, лучшее, квинтэссенция, суть

Мнемоника

Особый шик — сильно пудриться рисовой 米 пудрой.

Варианты

粹

koohiiStory1: In extremely chic restaurants, you have to pay 90 bucks for a bowl of rice.
koohiiStory2: Americans think that tattoos with Chinese characters are chic, but nine out of ten times they end up with something trivial tattooed on their arm, like rice.
jp_example_words:
粋(いき): chic, style, purity, essence
純粋(じゅんすい): pure, true, genuine, unmixed
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There’s some rice in the shape of a nine on a cross and this is stylish. The rice grains are arranged to form the number nine. This number nine is prominently displayed on the cross, and it’s stylish to carry it around and be seen with it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine hefting this cross with the rice in the shape of a nine on it. You don’t feel stylish, but society tells you that you are. You’re stylish.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: It’s also stylish to swing (すい) the cross around while you wait for things. You’re waiting at a bus stop so you swing the cross around violently. You swing it so violently that the rice comes flying off!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: See the rice fly through the air from you swinging the cross. Hear it as it clatters to the ground. This cross just isn’t as stylish anymore now.
Ru_Meaning: chic, style, purity, essence, pith, cream, elite, choice
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 枠 (わく каркас, скелет, корпус, рамка)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: nine out of ten (卆) lots of rice (米) are pure

粋(いき): chic, style, purity, essence
純粋(じゅんすい): pure, true, genuine, unmixed

粋字的基本解释

粋
cuì
古同“粹”。

粋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuì］
［《廣韻》雖遂切，去至，心。］
亦作“粋1”。
(1)不杂；纯。
(2)引申为专一。
(3)纯美。
(4)精华，精粹。
(5)精通；擅长。
(6)通“萃”。齐全；集聚。
[②]［suì］
［《集韻》蘇對切，去隊，心。］
亦作“粋2”。通“碎1”。
见“粹2折”。

粋字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【米字部】　粋； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页907第20
【篇海】音碎。純也，精微也。

粋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
粋字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
粋
cuì
Gu Tong is "pure".
粋
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cuì］
["Guangyun" is cut, and the heart is gone. ]
Also known as "粋1".
(1) Not miscellaneous; pure.
(2) The extension is single-minded.
(3) Pure beauty.
(4) Essence, essence.
(5) Proficient; good at.
(6) Through "extraction". Complete; gathering together.
[②]［suì］
["Ji Yun" Su cuts, goes to the team, heart. ]
Also known as "粋2". Pass "Broken 1".
See "Quite 2% Off".
粋
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Uncollected First] [Mi Zi Department] 　粋; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 907 No. 20
[Pianhai] The sound is broken. Pure and subtle.

粋
Name meaning
Nothing.
cuì
яп. вм. 粹
Radicals: 米, 九, 十  (rice, nine, cross)
Meaning Mnemonic
There’s some rice in the shape of a nine on a cross and this is stylish. The rice grains are arranged to form the number nine. This number nine is prominently displayed on the cross, and it’s stylish to carry it around and be seen with it.
Imagine hefting this cross with the rice in the shape of a nine on it. You don’t feel stylish, but society tells you that you are. You’re stylish.
Reading Mnemonic
It’s also stylish to swing (すい) the cross around while you wait for things. You’re waiting at a bus stop so you swing the cross around violently. You swing it so violently that the rice comes flying off!
See the rice fly through the air from you swinging the cross. Hear it as it clatters to the ground. This cross just isn’t as stylish anymore now.

十 (десять), 九 (девять), 米 (рис)
